enterPresent: Enter the number of present days
enterSick: Enter the number of sick days
enterAlpha: Enter the number of unjustified absences
enterVacationDays: Enter the number of vacation days
invalidNumber: The entered value is not valid. It must be greater than or equal to 0 and not contain letters.
invalidAmount: The entered amount is invalid. It must be a positive number with up to 2 decimal places.
attendanceDataAlreadySaved: Employee attendance data has already been saved. Please re-enter them when the period changes!
